articles.author: From CNN's Jeremy Herb, Lauren del Valle and Kara Scannell in the courthouse
articles.title: Live updates: Donald Trump's hush money trial - CNN International
articles.description: Donald Trump's New York hush money criminal trial continued Tuesday with more testimony from former tabloid executive David Pecker. The judge also held a gag order hearing.
articles.content:
Upon leaving the courtroom on Tuesday, former President Donald Trump approached media cameras, began talking, and complained that he is not allowed to talk. 
Trump was criticizing Judge Juan Merchan… [+2477 chars]
